about_the_game:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Get to work on the bustling Köln S-Bahn, take on new challenges and explore more on Schnellfahrstrecke Köln - Aachen with Train Sim World 2: New Journeys – S-Bahn Köln BR 423

Climb aboard the hard-working DB BR 423 and perform high density passenger duties on the Köln S-Bahn. On an additional timetable, which puts the DB BR 423 on S19 and brand new S12 services, ferry commuters in and out of the cathedral city to Horrem and Düren. Soak up the non-stop action as units work through day and night by their dozens, mixing in with Regional and ICE services.

Key Features


  • DB BR 423 EMU in DB Red S-Bahn Köln livery
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cab
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • 3 detailed and engaging scenarios on Schnellfahrstrecke Köln - Aachen
  • Includes a new Timetable for Schnellfahrstrecke Köln - Aachen
  • Livery Designer, Scenario Planner and Creators Club compatible
  • Download size: 133.89 MB
